ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:0.5_0: The training rule on learning pointless knowledge
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.2_0: At that time the nuns from the group of six were learning pointless knowledge.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.3_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.4_0: “How can the nuns learn pointless knowledge? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.7_0: “How can the nuns from the group do this?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, those nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns from the group of six do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun learns pointless knowledge, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.1.6_0: Whatever outsider has been used up by exterior?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.1.8_0: if she learns by the line, then for every line she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.1.9_0: If she learns by the syllable, then for every syllable she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.2.4_0: if she learns verses for the purpose of protection;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.2.6_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.2.7_0: The ninth rule, the training rule on nine, is finished.
